name: +SOUL Flower
description:
A Flower of life is a sacred geometric pattern occurring throughout multiple facets of reality, math and matter.
It's the simplistic nature of the circle, multiplied around itself that creates such awe-inspiring beauty and can only be described as sacred.
This simplistic beauty is just a mirror of our own +MIND's -BODY's and ~SOUL's. 
Unifying, loving and nourishing these Divine, simplistic and exact systems creates a higher state of consciousness and vibration throughout our internal and external reality.

1/1 - 1min - loop - 4K - 60FPS - AUDIO BY MANTISMASH
*Better encoding and quality version available to buyer!
